metadata.title: CVE-2020-36774 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: plugins/gtk+/glade-gtk-box.c in GNOME Glade before 3.38.1 and 3.39.x before3.40.0 mishandles widget rebuilding for GladeGtkBox, leading to a denial ofservice (application crash).

criterions.comment: glade: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
